data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Radea, Canella, Parmakelis, Aristeidis, Papadogiannis, Vassilis, Charou, Despoina, Triantis, Kostas A. (2013): The hydrobioid freshwater gastropods (Caenogastropoda, Truncatelloidea) of Greece: new records, taxonomic re-assessments using DNA sequence data and an update of the IUCN Red List Categories. ZooKeys 350: 1-20, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.350.6001, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.350.6001
